CustomField.description: Canvas Course URL calculated from Course ID and Section ID
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Canvas_Course_ID__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Canvas_Section_ID__c)),
"https://execed.instructure.com/courses/" & Canvas_Course_ID__c & "/sections/" & Canvas_Section_ID__c, null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Canvas Course URL calculated from Course ID and Section ID
CustomField.label: Canvas Course URL
